text: Mataram is a city on the west side of the island of Lombok, Indonesia. It is the capital and largest city of West Nusa Tenggara province, and has a population of around 342,896 people as of the year 2005. ==Other websites== * http://www.mataramkota.go.id/ Category:Lombok Category:Cities in Indonesia Category:West Nusa Tenggara
title: Mataram
